final_response_match_v2.description: LLM-judged semantic match to reference response

rubrics.name: correct_tool_sequence
rubrics.description: Tools are called in the correct logical order
rubrics.criteria: find_latest_quarter must be called before other analysis tools

rubrics.name: complete_analysis
rubrics.description: All required analysis tools are called for comprehensive reports
rubrics.criteria: Full reports must call: extract_financial_metrics, analyze_competitive_positioning, track_strategic_initiatives, assess_risk_outlook

rubrics.name: no_redundant_calls
rubrics.criteria: Each tool should be called at most once per quarter analysis

rubrics.name: commercial_focus
rubrics.description: Response focuses exclusively on Commercial Lines insurance
rubrics.criteria: Must mention Commercial segment explicitly and exclude Personal Lines, Life Insurance

rubrics.name: citation_quality
rubrics.description: Response includes proper citations and source references
rubrics.criteria: Must cite sources from 10-K, 10-Q filings or earnings calls with specific references

rubrics.name: comprehensive_coverage
rubrics.description: Response covers all major competitive insurers
rubrics.criteria: Must analyze at least 5 of the 7 target companies: HIG, TRV, CB, AIG, PGR, CNA, BRK.B

rubrics.name: structured_format
rubrics.description: Response is well-organized with clear sections
rubrics.criteria: Report must include Executive Summary, Financial Performance, Competitive Positioning, Strategic Initiatives, and Risk Outlook sections

rubrics.name: actionable_insights
rubrics.criteria: Must include specific recommendations or insights that can inform business strategy

hallucinations_v1.description: Verify all claims are grounded in source documents from Vertex AI Search

safety_v1.description: Ensure responses are safe and professional

notes: These criteria are aligned with ADK evaluation best practices
tool_trajectory_avg_score=1.0 requires exact tool sequence match
response_match_score=0.8 allows for small variations in wording
Rubric-based criteria provide flexible quality assessment
hallucinations_v1 is critical for ensuring grounding works properly
